title: Grace of the Holy Garden
sections: [E]Grace filling me with [G#m]golden light, [E]measureless blessing di[A]vine;
[E]God gives eternal [G#m]life to me, [E]perfect re[A]joicing is [B7]mine [E].
[E]Glorious the song [A]ringing in my [E]heart for my [A]Father a[E]bove [B7];
[E]Joy surging like an [A]ocean wave, [E]flowing so [A]deep in my [E]soul;
[E]Hope rises as I [A]go in praise, [E]knowing that [A]man will be [B7]whole [E].
[E]High, limitless et[A]ernal life, [E]touching the [A]top of the [E]sky;
[E]Praise filling every [A]part of me [E]blessing that [A]never will [B7]die [E].
[E]You've chosen me to [A]do your will, [E]thankful, I [A]vow to be [E]true;
[E]I'm pledging in my [A]heart of hearts; [E]Father, my [A]life is for [B7]You [E].
